title: [Atoll, Obsidian Pathway]
description: The path widens to accommodate a grotto offering refuge to those who seek it.  A makeshift wall is fashioned out of driftwood, seaweed, and rocks in front of the grotto.  Growing off to one side, a dark tree sapped of life looms over the obsidian path.

The path widens to accommodate a grotto offering refuge to those who seek it.  A makeshift wall is fashioned out of driftwood, seaweed, and rocks in front of the grotto, and growing off to one side, a dark tree sapped of life looms over the obsidian path.
